title: (New Team) Looking for Plat+ Players, not competitve, try getting ranked in high gold or plat
body:
Hey Guys, this is a non-competitive team. (New Team)
Requirements:
Plat+ Players
No comm needed
Not Serious
Just trying to improve and get a higher ranked team
Role pref

Thank you

replies.body:
Season 3 Plat 4 Support Main decayed to plat 5, Have been told by fair few challenger team mates over time that I could make it to diamond if put the time in to it, But I really just can't be bothered dealing with solo queue as a support main. 

Season 4 I didn't really play ranked at all, Joining solo queue and yolo troll picked and lost about 7-8 games, Got put in silver 3 for the lols, Due to work didnt play really consistently but the past few weeks i started climbing again got bored, silver 1 , probably try for plat next week again. 

But anyway, Been playing since season 2, Pretty much just support main Thresh-Janna-Blitz-Braum-Alistar--Leona-Annie-Zyra, But I can play adc aswell mainly Jinx/Cait, I have a high understanding of game mechanics, timers, trades coming from a 5 year stint of playing dota i came into league pretty fresh and foudn the game pretty easy

I can play Ori mid, And other roles are pretty sub par. Usually keeep them to normals.

Add ing on R3demption

Im Bronze!

(Sorry, i just had to say that. Hehehe)

-GL,HF
